mapper.insert: INSERT INTO donation_reviews (member_id, donation_id, reviewer_name, title, rating, content, is_anonymous, helpful_count, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{donationId}, #{reviewerName}, #{title}, #{rating}, #{content}, #{isAnonymous}, COALESCE(#{helpfulCount}, 0), NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT dr.review_id, dr.member_id, dr.donation_id, dr.reviewer_name, dr.title, dr.rating, dr.content, dr.is_anonymous, dr.helpful_count, dr.created_at, dr.updated_at, dc.category_name as category, d.amount as donation_amount, d.donation_type FROM donation_reviews dr LEFT JOIN donations d ON dr.donation_id = d.donation_id LEFT JOIN donation_categories dc ON d.category_id = dc.category_id WHERE dr.review_id = #{reviewId}

SELECT dr.review_id, dr.member_id, dr.donation_id, dr.reviewer_name, dr.title, dr.rating, dr.content, dr.is_anonymous, dr.helpful_count, dr.created_at, dr.updated_at, dc.category_name as category, d.amount as donation_amount, d.donation_type FROM donation_reviews dr LEFT JOIN donations d ON dr.donation_id = d.donation_id LEFT JOIN donation_categories dc ON d.category_id = dc.category_id ORDER BY dr.created_at DESC

SELECT dr.review_id, dr.member_id, dr.donation_id, dr.reviewer_name, dr.title, dr.rating, dr.content, dr.is_anonymous, dr.helpful_count, dr.created_at, dr.updated_at, dc.category_name as category, d.amount as donation_amount, d.donation_type FROM donation_reviews dr LEFT JOIN donations d ON dr.donation_id = d.donation_id LEFT JOIN donation_categories dc ON d.category_id = dc.category_id WHERE dr.member_id = #{userId} ORDER BY dr.created_at DESC
